channel.title: CVE Feed for instawp -- InstaWP Connect – 1-click WP Staging & Migration
channel.description: The latest CVEs for instawp -- InstaWP Connect – 1-click WP Staging & Migration

item.title: CVE-2024-2667|2024-05-02T16:52:52.798Z -- instawp -- InstaWP Connect – 1-click WP Staging & Migration
item.description: The InstaWP Connect – 1-click WP Staging & Migration plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to insufficient file validation in the /wp-json/instawp-connect/v1/config REST API endpoint in all versions up to, and including, 0.1.0.22. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to upload arbitrary files.
